[@microsoft/fast-element](./fast-element.md) &gt; [Splice](./fast-element.splice.md)

## Splice interface

Represents a set of splice-based changes against an Array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Splice 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addedCount](./fast-element.splice.addedcount.md) | number | The number of items that were added. |
|  [index](./fast-element.splice.index.md) | number | The index that the splice occurs at. |
|  [removed](./fast-element.splice.removed.md) | any\[\] | The items that were removed. |
